Flat Roofing Commercial and Residential

Expert flat roof repairs, replacements, and maintenance to ensure lasting waterproof protection.

Call (403) 470-8666

Services

Expert flat roof replacements for residential, commercial, and industrial buildings. We specialize in durable, energy-efficient systems that ensure long-lasting waterproof protection. Whether you need a full roof replacement or a cost-effective recover, our team delivers fast, budget-friendly, and environmentally conscious solutions that fit your needs.

Flat Roof Types

  • BUR (Built-Up Roof) / Tar and Gravel Roofs
  • EPDM Roofs
  • TPO Roofs

Flat Roof Replacements and Recovery

We remove old flat roof systems or recover existing ones to save you time, money, and effort. Every installation is designed for efficiency, durability, and leak prevention — with materials and methods tailored to meet your budget and project requirements.
